input.sentences: the friends went to summer camp to learn how to dance .
the friends had a special dance teacher .
during the program the friends were able to get temporary tattoos .
when the friends were taking a break from dancing they played baseball .
at the end of the day the friends were happy with the dance moves they learned .
output.sentences: We decided to take a small summer camp to learn new things and make new friends.
I had a wonderful teacher who was special as making friends
We gotten temporary tattoos and the program gave use soe extra ones to take home.
I was taking pictures as they played and my friends wanted me to join in the fun.
What moves me is that i learned that i can be open with my friends and be happy.
